name: 2021 the 4th International Conference on Smart Grid and Energy（ICSGE 2021）
content: Publication： All accepted (Registered & Presented) papers of ICSGE2021 will be collected in the E3S conference proceedings(eISSN: 2267-1242), which is indexed by Google Scholar, CAS, DOAJ, EBSCO, ProQuest, Scopus and Ei Compendex, etc. Special Issue-Energies (IF 3.004; ISSN 1996-1073; CODEN: ENERGA) Indexing: Science Citation Index Expanded (Web of Science), Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
